name: Asset
desc: The assets for creating Creative Sets.

items.name: appPreviewDevice
items.desc: The device that’s available for the asset, corresponding to the display size. See Get App Preview Device Sizes for device mapping in the API.

items.name: deleted
items.desc: The deleted assets of the Creative Set.

items.name: orientation
items.desc: The orientation of the asset that you upload to App Store Connect.

items.name: type
items.desc: The type of creative asset. App previews are still images of video assets that you upload to App Store Connect. Note, the playable URL isn’t in the response. A screenshot is a standard image of the app that you upload to App Store Connect.
